<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Unmemorable Mantle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=513)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, shoddy cloak bears a hood and a simple brass clasp. While wearing the cloak, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.
